revision.comment: [[WP:AES|←]]Created page with ''''Al Amir Mohamed Waheed Deen''' is the Current Vice President of the Republic of Maldives. He was appointed by His Excellency President Dr Mohamed Waheed Hassa...'
revision.text:
'''Al Amir Mohamed Waheed Deen''' is the Current Vice President of the Republic of Maldives. He was appointed by His Excellency President Dr Mohamed Waheed Hassan Manik on February 15th 2012.He is also the Chairman of Bandos Island Resort.Mr Deen is the Son of His Royal Highness Prince Abdullah Imaaduddeen and Koli Dhon Didi.He is also a Member of the Maldivian Royal Family as his Grand father was Sultan Hajy Imaaduddeen IV of Maldives.
<ref>Haveeru News on 15th February 2012 , Maldives Royal Family Website, </ref>

'''Al Amir Mohamed Waheed Deen''' is the Current Vice President of the Republic of Maldives. He was appointed by His Excellency President Dr Mohamed Waheed Hassan Manik on February 15th 2012.He is also the Chairman of Bandos Island Resort.Mr Deen is the Son of His Royal Highness Prince Abdullah Imaaduddeen and Koli Dhon Didi.He is also a Member of the Maldivian Royal Family as his Grand father was Sultan Hajy Imaaduddeen IV of Maldives.
<ref>Haveeru News on 15th February 2012 , Maldives Royal Family Website, </ref> == References == {{reflist}}
